revised_title: Magnetic Results of the Voyage of H.M.S. Penguin: Observations and Discoveries
tldr: The author presents the magnetic observations and findings from the voyage of H.M.S. Penguin from 1890-93, focusing on the West Coast of Australia. The study highlights the importance of magnetic surveys at sea and on land, and the discovery of a magnetic shoal under the sea at Port Walcott, which caused significant local magnetic disturbances.
